analysis.key_quote: This rule will make it easier to fire workers for politicized reasons. Civil service should be non-partisan, and if only workers who align with a particular set of politics are allowed to serve in these roles The American People will no longer be able to trust them to be unbiased.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service, emphasizing the need for non-partisan governance.
